snippet: Import prices fell in July for the fourth consecutive month as costs declined for imported oil, industrial supplies and even many consumer goods.
abstract: Labor Department reports that import prices fell unexpectedly in July for the fourth consecutive month, further reducing inflation pressures, as costs declined for imported oil, industrial supplies and even many consumer goods
lead_paragraph: Import prices fell in July for the fourth consecutive month as costs declined for imported oil, industrial supplies and even many consumer goods.

headline.seo: Import Prices Fell Unexpectedly in July
headline.main: Imports Cost Less in July as Oil Prices Edged Down
headline.print_headline: Imports Cost Less in July As Oil Prices Edged Down
